issuer_name.description: Business full legal name issuing the invoice (usually contains 'Α.Ε.')
issuer_name.title: Issuer Name

document_number.description: Invoice document number or alphanumberic sequence including a space
document_number.title: Document Number

customer_name.description: Customer's name. If nooe is found return [redacted]
customer_name.title: Customer Name

customer_address.description: Customer's address (no newline chars, include postal code). If none is found, return [redacted]
customer_address.title: Customer Address

customer_vat_number.description: Customer VAT number, usually denoted as 'ΑΦΜ' or 'Α.Φ.Μ.'. If none is found, return [redacted]
customer_vat_number.title: Customer Vat Number

bill_type.description: Type of bill, 'Έναντι' or 'Εκκαθαριστικός' only, 'None' otherwise
bill_type.title: Bill Type

bill_period_start.description: Start date of the billing period in YYYY-MM-DD format
bill_period_start.title: Bill Period Start

bill_period_end.description: End date of the billing period in YYYY-MM-DD format
bill_period_end.title: Bill Period End

bill_due_date.description: Due date for the invoice payment in YYYY-MM-DD format
bill_due_date.title: Bill Due Date

bill_total_fixed_charges.description: Total fixed charges on the invoice. Subtract any discounts (usually refered to as 'Έκπτωση παγίου')
bill_total_fixed_charges.title: Bill Total Fixed Charges

bill_vat_amount.description: Total VAT amount on the invoice (ΦΠΑ)
bill_vat_amount.title: Bill Vat Amount

bill_refund_amount.description: Total refund amount on the invoice including minus sign, and excluding fixed charges. If it does not exist, return 'None'
bill_refund_amount.title: Bill Refund Amount

bill_total_amount.description: Total amount due on the invoice
bill_total_amount.title: Bill Total Amount

commission_of_power_charges.description: Commission of power charges in euros (€)
commission_of_power_charges.title: Commission Of Power Charges

bill_fees_amount.description: Total fees amount on the invoice, like 'Τέλος', 'Ε.Τ.Μ.Ε.Α.Ρ.' and 'Ειδικός Φόρος Κατανάλωσης', but not 'increase'
bill_fees_amount.title: Bill Fees Amount

rate_per_kilowatt_hour.description: Rate per kilowatt hour (€/kWh). Subtract any consistent payment bonus, like 'Έκπτωση συνέπειας'
rate_per_kilowatt_hour.title: Rate Per Kilowatt Hour
